templates.name: Linaro cross-toolchain for 64-bit Armv8 Cortex-A GCC 7.4.1
templates.description: Dev container for Raspberry Pi 3 / 4 board with Yocto 64-bit, CMake and Azure IoT Device C SDK.
templates.detail: Create project that connects to Azure IoT Hub, such as sending sensor data to cloud.

templates.name: Linaro cross-toolchain for 32-bit Armv7 Cortex-A GCC 7.4.1
templates.description: Dev container for Raspberry Pi series board with Raspbian, CMake and Azure IoT Device C SDK.
templates.detail: Create project that connects to Azure IoT Hub, such as sending sensor data to cloud.

templates.name: Esp32
templates.detail: Create project with only device code.

templates.name: Esp32 with Azure IoT Hub
templates.detail: Create project that connects to Azure IoT Hub, such as sending sensor data to cloud.

templates.name: IoT DevKit
templates.detail: Create project with only device code.

templates.name: IoT DevKit with Azure IoT Hub
templates.detail: Create project that connects to Azure IoT Hub, such as sending sensor data to cloud.

templates.name: IoT DevKit With Azure Functions
templates.detail: Create project that connects to Azure IoT Hub and processes device data further in Azure Functions.

templates.name: IoT DevKit With Stream Analytics and Cosmos DB
templates.detail: Create project that processes device data from IoT Hub in Stream Analytics and store the result in Cosmos DB.
